results.deck: The Lightning Saga is a comic book crossover story arc that took place in DC Comics' two flagship team books: Justice League of America and Justice Society of America. It was written by Brad Meltzer and Geoff Johns, and illustrated by Ed Benes, Dale Eaglesham, and Shane Davis.
results.name: The Lightning Saga

results.deck: Matthew Ryder is sent back to 1991 to try to prevent the evil dictator Monarch from ever achieving power.
results.name: Armageddon 2001

results.deck: Death resurrects Thanos who acquires the six infinity gems and kills half the life in the universe in her honor with the Infinity Gauntlet. Adam Warlock leads Earth's Mightiest Heroes against the Mad Titan.

image.image_tags: All Images,Artwork,Earth-616 Avengers,Earth-616 Cloak,Earth-616 Cyclops,Earth-616 Doctor Doom,Earth-616 Doctor Strange,Earth-616 Drax,Earth-616 Firelord,Earth-616 Hulk,Earth-616 Iron Man,Earth-616 Namor,Earth-616 Nova,Earth-616 Quasar,Earth-616 Scarlet Witch,Earth-616 She-Hulk,Earth-616 Silver Surfer,Earth-616 Thor,Earth-616 Vision,Earth-616 Warlock,Earth-616 Wolverine,Infinity Gauntlet

results.name: Infinity Gauntlet

results.deck: Marvel Comics' 2012 event. As a repercussion from the events that took place in The Children's Crusade, Fear Itself, Schism, and X-Sanction, the Avengers and X-Men go to war over the return of the Phoenix Force.
results.name: Avengers vs. X-Men

results.deck: The Secret Wars was a ground breaking mini-series from Marvel that brought all of Earth-616's greatest heroes together to battle with the worst villains under the watchful eye of the Beyonder.
results.name: Secret Wars

results.deck: Peter Cannon aka Thunderbolt has just  helped the Meta-Agents to stop an alien invasion. The problem is he suspects the invasion is an hoax elaborated to force the world powers to unite against a fake enemy.   And he knows the only person capable to do such thing is himself. Now Who is Watching him?
results.name: Watch

results.deck: Horror devastates the DC Universe as its greatest heroes confront their worst nightmare in this terrifying epic, perfect for all fans of Batman, Superman, and Wonder Woman!
results.name: Knight Terrors

results.deck: A cross-publisher event of a series of titles put out by both Marvel Comics and DC Comics under the name Amalgam Comics, it blended elements from the two publishers' catalogs.
results.name: Amalgam

results.deck: One of the biggest shocks in the comic book industry, the death of Gwen Stacy.  The Green Goblin kidnaps Gwen and throws her off the Brooklyn Bridge. Spider-Man tries to save her but is unsuccessful.
results.name: The Death of Gwen Stacy

results.deck: Being manipulated by the Time Trapper, Superboy-Prime goes on a rampage with the Legion of Super-Villains to destroy the Legion of Super-Heroes.

image.image_tags: All Images,Legion of Earth-247,Legion of Earth-Prime,Legion of Three Worlds

results.name: Final Crisis: Legion of Three Worlds

results.deck: The Justice League Europe must stop the Extremist from Angor before they destroy the earth in the same way they destroyed their own world.
results.name: The Extremist Vector

results.deck: Whatever happenend to Hop Harrigan, Golden age ace pilot? Discovering his fate is a work for Superman.
